explanation: [0-0] A boy in a green shirt holds a broken blue ring in his hand. The background is yellow, with a cactus on the left side of the screen. There are clouds above the boy's head and small black grass on the ground.

[0-4] The boy in the green shirt keeps turning the blue ring. When he stops, he finds that it is a blue rabbit. He grabs the rabbit's ear with his right hand and laughs. Then he continues to turn the rabbit into a blue ring. A boy in a red shirt walks in from the right side of the screen. He is angry at the boy in green and lifts him into the air behind him, away from the blue rabbit. The boy in green closes his mouth and eyes tightly.

[4-11] Then the boy in green secretly opens his right eye and finds the blue rabbit spinning in mid-air by itself. The boy in green asks the boy in red to look, puzzled. They both walk to the sides of the ring where the rabbit is spinning. The boy in red gently pushes the ring with his finger, and the ring turns towards the boy in green. The boy in green runs away scared, while the blue rabbit continues to spin. The boy in red also turns and walks away, disappearing from the left side of the screen.
